channel.title: Personal Code Projects on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Personal Code Projects on Dan Aukes

item.title: Blogger Extractor
item.description: A nice little package for exporting your blogger site to markdown.

item.title: Decapitalizer
item.description: A nice little program that can change capitalization. Includes installer.

item.title: Empty QT5 GUI
item.description: A nice little empty python package for developing qt5 guis, with installer setup file.

item.title: Gitman repository manager
item.description: A nice little package for synchronizing git repositories all over your computer

item.title: Handy Media Tools
item.description: Useful and reusable media tools Package URL: https://github.com/danb0b/code_media_tools

item.title: OpenCV Photobooth
item.description: A qt5 gui and opencv make it possible to make your own photobooth at home!

item.title: Pandoc-Plus
item.description: A collection of utilities to make converting files easier in pandoc.

item.title: Powerpoint to Markdown Converter
item.description: A package for converting powerpoint files to markdown-beamer. requires pandoc, powerpoint
